channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Thief
channel.description:
The Thieve
Neutral Wildcard/Social Outcast(Passive) - As a outcast, you cannot put your name to become king. Armed and Dangerous(Passive) - If a killer was to attack you, for the first time you will protect yourself against the attacker.
Replicate(Day) - Target a Player, whatever day ability was used on them you will be able to replicate the ability the next day. (Unlimited) Infiltrate(Day) - Follow a player back to their room this night seeing anything they see. (2 uses)
Theft(Night) - Steal a player's abilities, making you be able to use them the following night (Does not work on mastermind/cult leader/prince/king) they will be unable to use their ability the following night. (3 Uses)
Robbery(Night) - Rob a Player at night and get money accordingly (0 King, 1 Support/Offensive, 2 Special/Wildcard, 3 Killer(Not counting prince),4 Investigative/Social, 5 Prince.) (Unlimited)
Win Conditions: Gather 20 gold while staying alive
